author: nick
msg: Upgrade the Ogg plugin to 0.4, re-enable the FLAC test, and add an Opus one. Solves TIKA-1259 and TIKA-1113

author: veithm
msg: Adding additional argument for custom build options
Now it is possible to set additional compiler specific build options to
CMake via ant. This is e.g. needed if you would like to do parallel builds
